Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a red-grey pottery vessel, interior slightly grooved, exterior covered with a highly burnished cream-coloured slip and with faint traces of one line of black-painted hieratic text identifying contents.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393191) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393191)
